last_episode_to_air.name: Return of Rava
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tormack's niece tries to steal the kingdom for herself.

name: Galtar and the Golden Lance
overview:
Galtar and the Golden Lance is an animated television series produced by Hanna-Barbera in the 1980s. It was originally produced and released as part of a five-in-one omnibus program, The Funtastic World of Hanna-Barbera, of which Challenge of the Gobots, The Jetsons, Paw Paws, and Yogi's Treasure Hunt as part of the 1985's inaugurated allstar 1st lineup.

The TV series has been considered to have been created due to the rise and popularity of the He-Man franchise.

episodes.name: Galtar and the Princess
episodes.overview: Galtar and Princess Goleeta begin their quest to find the Golden Lance and the Sacred Shield that is needed to defeat the despot Tormack.

episodes.name: Skull Forest
episodes.overview: Prince Pandat of the Nerms saves Galtar and Princess Goleeta from Rak's trap. He brings them to Pandat as Tormack begins his attack.

episodes.name: Mursa the Merciless
episodes.overview: The evil witch Mursa traps Princess Goleeta and steals her youth. Galtar works with the mysterious White Knight to rescue Princess Goleeta and defeat Mursa.

episodes.name: Goleeta's Reunion
episodes.overview: Princess Goleeta's brother Zorn is captured and forced to work in Tormack's mines as Rak and Tuk lead her into a trap where she gets captured by Tormack.

episodes.name: Shadowhaunt
episodes.overview: Galtar, Princess Goleeta, and Zorn enter Shadowhaunt, where they are attacked by an invisible monster.

episodes.name: Tormack's Trap
episodes.overview: Galtar saves a young woman named Rava who helps Galtar, Princess Goleeta, and Zorn get into Tormack's castle. What they don't know is that Rava is Tormack's niece.

episodes.name: Wicked Alliance
episodes.overview: Krimm teams up with Mursa in a plot to defeat Galtar and get their hands on the Golden Lance.

episodes.name: Vikor's Raiders
episodes.overview: The Raiders led by Vikor kidnap Tuk and managed to steal the Golden Lance. Rak persuades Galtar to let him help out so that he can save his son.

episodes.name: The Manta Marauders
episodes.overview: A mysterious ship steals some treasure and accidentally kidnaps Goleeta and disappears through a vortex. Galtar must go to an unknown world to save her.

episodes.name: The Master Fighters
episodes.overview: In another attempt to defeat Galtar, Krimm creates three warriors, the Master Fighters. Galtar must defeat them to save the kidnapped Goleeta.

episodes.name: The Maze of Magus
episodes.overview: The Magus, an avid hunter, traps Galtar and his companions in a maze. Galtar must defeat Magus and find a way out of his maze to escape.

episodes.name: Falca - Priestess of Prey
episodes.overview: Galtar and Goleeta are kidnapped by an evil bird woman, Falca. It is up to Zorn to inspire a your bird man to rise up and save his people and Galtar.

episodes.name: The Silver Sword
episodes.overview: Tormack creates the invincible "Silver Sword". With help from a friend from the past, Galtar must find the courage to face Tormack even if it will mean his defeat.

episodes.name: Zorn Meets Marin
episodes.overview: When Zorn is swept down river, he befriends the young wildling Marin.

episodes.name: Vikor's Revenge
episodes.overview: Vikor returns to seek revenge on Galtar. With the help of a new ally, Galtar must save a kidnapped Goleeta and Zorn.

episodes.name: Galtar's  Challenge
episodes.overview: Closing in on Bandisar, Galtar sends a challenge to fight Tormack. But Tormack chooses a monstrous beast to fight instead of facing Galtar himself.

episodes.name: Ither's Apprentice
episodes.overview: Ither takes on a new apprentice. However, Zorn suspects this new apprentice may be more than he seems.

episodes.name: Antara the Terrible
episodes.overview: A sorceress named Antara promises to overthrow Tormack if Galtar will help her find a magical stone.

episodes.name: Tormack's Treachery
episodes.overview: In a plot to trap Galtar, Tormack and the heroes are taken prisoner by a deadly snow demon.

episodes.name: Love of Evil
episodes.overview: Galtar and friends must rescue Rava from marriage to a slug-like creature.

episodes.name: Return of Rava
episodes.overview: Tormack's niece tries to steal the kingdom for herself.
